description: a(n)=3-k(n), where k=A006928; also, a and k have the same runlength sequence, with n-th term k(n-1) for n >= 2.
comments: Essentially the same as A049705. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 15 2008]
formula: a(n) = A049705(n+1) = A088569(n) for n > 1. - _Jean-Christophe Herv√©_, Nov 10 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
